choices: 12 (Laura is now 28)
10 (Laura is now 30)
8 (Laura is now 32)
4 (Laura is now 36)
2 (Laura is now 38)
1.content:
Laura (Age 40) would be shopping one day in her local mall, when she’d find a odd case on the ground with two dice... confused as to why they were there she would examine them, touching them and hearing an odd voice echo in her head...

“The dice of youth have bonded with you, may they bring you happiness or sorrow.”

Before immediately fading out with nothing more to say, leaving the woman clearly confused but shrugging it off as she took the case with the dice and put it in her pocket. She would continue to shop until she bought some clothes and went to try them on, accidentally knocking the dice out of her pocket... what does she roll as this happens?
1.title: Laura’s Encounter with the Dice of Youth

choices: One of the dice bonds to Katlin
11.content:
Laura had spent the last fifteen minutes staring dumbfounded at the box on her desk. The idea that a set of dice could make someone younger seemed impossible. As she looked in the mirror though she realized it was harder and harder to deny.

Laura had carefully looked over her herself not only noticing the lack of grey but other changes as well. There had been a small scar on her left forearm from a hiking accident when she was 38. While it originally injury was nothing severe it had left a noticeable scar, at least it was noticeable to Laura. When she had rolled up the sleeve of her blouse she found the scar was no longer visible. Laura had spent several minutes running her fingers along her now smooth forearm and could feel no trace of the offending mark.

“This is crazy,” she whispered. “How could this be possible? Things like this don’t exist in real life.” Glancing back at the mirrror she sighed. This was real and it was really happening. Shaking her head she now began to carefully search the package for anything that would tell her where it came from. After several moments of fruitless searching she found what she was looking for. On the bottom of the box was an address. As she carefully examined it her eyes bulged. “That place is four hours away,” she exclaimed.

Laura now sat down pondering her situation. The dice had made her 36 again. While being back in her thirties wasn’t a bad thing she couldn’t help thinking about what the voice had said. “Each roll will give you back more of what you lost,” she mumbled. Working the puzzle out in her head she realized that each successive roll would make her younger. Another roll of the dice could leave her anywhere between 34 and 24. The prospect of becoming so young again was thrilling it was also a little unnerving. If the dice happened to roll a high number and then we’re rolled again she could easily find herself returning to her teens or younger. Shaking her head she realized that wasn’t an appealing option. She needed to return these dice as quickly as possible, failure to do so could mean they could accidentally be rolled, making her much younger than she wished to be.

The sound of the door opening caused Laura to jump, turning quickly she could see Kaitlin had returned with dinner. As the 39 year old entered Laura tried her best to compose herself. “Hey Laura I got dinner,” she called. Laura tried to smile but could see the look of concern on her friends face.

“You feeling alright,” Kaitlin asked. “You look pale.”

Laura nodded sheepishly as she grabbed her meal and made her way back to her desk. “Uh yeah just hungry,” she said quickly. Kaitlin gave her friend a bemused look as she scanned the desk. “Oh you opened the package what was in it?”

Laura paused as she watched her friend examine the opened package. “Nothing,” she said quickly. “It...Uh..was meant for someone else.”

Kaitlin furrowed her brow as she now picked up the box containing the dice. “So what is this,” She’s asked.

Laura could feel herself breaking into a cold sweat as she watched Kaitlin open the box. Curious the honey haired woman took the dice from their resting place, examining them carefully. “These are really nice,” she said in awe, fingering the dice. “Be careful with those,” Laura said quickly. “Their fragile.”

“Cmon Laura don’t be silly,” she laughed. “Who would make fragile dice.” Before Laura could say another word she watched as Kaitlin rolled them on her desk. “No,” she shouted as they clattered on the oak top. Laura watched in horror as the dice clattered across the table, finally landing on six.

“Thirty six years you have walked this earth. Now this number is but thirty, each roll of the dice shall restore more of what you have lost.”

“What was that,” Kaitlin exclaimed in alarm. Before Laura could answer she could feel her body begin to tingle as a golden light covered her body. Laura watched dumbstruck as more orbs of light seemed to float off her body. In only a moment the feeling subsided leaving the two women staring at eachother in stunned silence.

“Kaitlin don’t touch those,” Laura said quickly. Picking up the dice she carefully placed them in their case once more slamming the lid down.

“Laura what’s going on,” Kaitlin said. “That voice...then you start glowing. What the hell just happened?!?!”

Laura sighed as she looked at her friend. “You wouldn’t believe me if I told you,” she sighed. Kaitlin narrowed her eyes as she gazed at her friend. Laura seemed different somehow yet she couldn’t quite place her finger on it. Laura’s skin and hair seemed a little livelier but Kaitlin chalked it up to a trick of the light. “Well try me,” she said crossing her arms and staring at her seated friend.

Laura sighed as she looked up from her desk. “Okay fine,” She huffed. “Those dice are magical. Apparently they can make a person younger. I rolled the dice earlier and they made me 36. Now you justin rolled them so now I’m 30.”

“Yeah okay,” Kaitlin giggled.

“Take a close look at me Kaitlin,” Laura fumed. “Do I look like I’m in my forties.”

Kaitlin sighed as she approached her friend. She wasn’t quite sure what her friend was up to but was willing to humor her. Stepping closer she now looked over her friend with a critical eye. As she did she was shocked as she realized her friend may be on to something.

“L...Laura,” She stammered. “Oh my god! You...you look..”

“Like I’m thirty,”

Kaitlin nodded, still stunned at her friends transformation. “But...how,” she exclaimed.

“I don’t know,” Laura sighed. “I think the dice are magical. They....they seem to make a person younger based on what they roll.”

“Well that doesn’t sound too bad,” Kaitlin said. “I mean I know I wouldn’t mind being a little younger. Forty is only a few monthes away for me.”

“The problem is though Kaitlin is that it won’t stop,” she said. “The dice are connected to me somehow. Every time they get rolled I get a bit younger. The next time someone rolls them I could end up anywhere between 28 and 18.”

Kaitlin’s eyes went wide as she realized the implications of what her friend was saying. Being a little younger wasn’t a bad thing but if the dice kept getting rolled Laura could suddenly find herself reliving her childhood once more...or worse. “So what are you going to do,” she whispered.

Laura stood up, straightening out her outfit before looking at her friend. “Well there’s an address on the back,” she said. “I need to return them and find out why the year came to me. Hopefully then I can get the dice to stop affecting me.”

Kaitlin nodded before looking her friend over. “Let me help,” she pleaded. “It’s my fault the dice got rolled again. I don’t want anything else to happen to you. I can see how freaked out you are about this so let me come with you so that maybe we can both fix this.”

“The place isn’t about a four hour trip from here,” Laura sighed. “You don’t need to do that.”

Kaitlin folded her arms as she narrowed her eyes at her friend. “Laura in about 30 minutes you went from 43 to 30. What happens if the dice get rolled again while you’re on the road. What if you keep getting younger and you get too young to drive. Please I don’t want anything to happen to you.”

Laura sighed as she looked towards Kaitlin, she’s had a point. If the dice kept getting rolled She’s could find herself too young to drive. If she became stranded she would have no way to get where she needed to go. “Okay fine,” She lamented. “But we have to be quick. It’s almost 6 p.m. now. I need to get to this address and fix this as soon a a possible.”

“We’ll do this Laura no worries,” Kaitlin grinned. “Now come on. Let’s get this little road trip started.”

The two women’s jumped into Laura’s Toyota and turned out of the parking lot. THe trip itself would take four hours by the highway, giving the two women plenty of time to think. Laura asked that Kaitlin keep the box safe as they turned onto the freeway. “I want to make sure nothing happens to that box,” She’s said handing the he box to Kaitlin. Kaitlin promise she’s would keep it safe and not allow it to be rolled again. As Laura now sped down the high way she could only hope they couldn’t reach the place where the dice came from safely.
11.title: 12 (Laura is now 28)

choices: Katlin comes back
Accidentally knocks them over
Someone else comes by
12.content:
"Oh, screw it, I can't let an opportunity like this pass me up." Laura said, throwing down the box and reaching back for the dice. Picking them back up and looking down at them. "Here we go again." She said as she threw them once more.
"A three and a two, so five?" She said, looking at the results.
"Thirty six years you have walked this Earth, now this number is but Thirty one, each roll of the dice shall restore more of what you have lost." The spirit of the dice said as the orbs of light appeared once more and absorbed into Laura's body. Laura immediately knew that this wasn't a hoax, as she felt herself getting stronger and more energetic as the orbs disappeared.
"Shit!" She said as she picked the dice back up and put them on the table. "I've got to go and find out where the place that sent me these is."
"The address is 0777 Restart Rd.? There's a strange name if I ever heard one." She said.
12.title: The dice are rolled again

choices: Welcome back to high school Laura
Walk to a Nearby Mall
Go to look for clothes only to accidentally roll the dice again
122.content:
Laura, still a bit off balance from the changes she had just undergone, pulls her coat off the nearby chair and sweeps the dice off the table in the motion. Her heart sinks into her stomach as they clatter to the floor. Before she even has time to fully process the implications, the spirits voice speaks once again.

"Thirty one years you have walked this Earth, now this number is but twenty one, each roll of the dice shall restore more of what you have lost."

"Oh crap!"

The changes this time are more extreme than in either previous roll. Droping back to her early adulthood, her clothes become baggy as she loses all the weight she had gained since graduating college. Left with the odd mixture of more energy she had felt in a long time as well as deep dread, Laura quickly scooped up the dice and returned them to their case. Just as she placed the case into her coat pocket she heard a voice behind her.

"Hey, what are you doing her alone so late young lady?"

She turns around to see Thomas the security guard. Her mind blanks as she struggles to come up with an explanation besides she was Laura but magical dice cut her age in over half.

"No need to look so frightened you aren't in any trouble. Interns just aren't allowed to be in the office without a supervisor outside of normal hours."

Intern. She didn't much like the sound of the demotion, but until she could get this mess sorted it was a good enough excuse as any.

"I'm sorry. I guess I was so wrapped in work I lost track of the time."

She tried not to wince as she heard her new youthful voice.

Thomas chuckles and then says, "Careful if you say things like that to your bosses you will be volunteered for all of the long shifts. Come on I'll walk you out to the parking lot."

Laura seeing not much of a choice, accepts the offer and is led out of the building. Once they reach the parking lot she thanks Thomas for being so understanding. He says goodbye and tells her she should probably get some work clothes of her own and not borrow her mother's. Laura breathes a sigh of relief and makes her way to her car only to then realize she left her purse with her keys, walket, and phone back in the office.

"Oh no, what am I going to do now?”
122.title: Accidentally knocks them over

choices: Try to sneakily return to her office to reclaim her bag
Sneak over to the library computers to search for the magic shop
Before she can leave she is ushered to the children’s section by a librarian
1223.content:
As Laura kicked herself for forgetting something so important, she realized she could hardly go anywhere dressed in ill fitting clothes and heels at least a half size too big. Apart from being awkward it was more than a little suspicious and not everyone would be as nonchalant about it as Thomas.

Laura recalls seeing the library across the street advertising a clothing exchange perhaps she'll find something there. She makes her way there with no problems and finds the room where clothing has been left for the public to browse. Thankfully, it appears no one but Laura is here and she begins looking for something her new size. Her mistake comes as she takes off her coat, not realizing in her haste to put the dice away she did not secure the pocket. Once again the dice clatter to the floor.

"Twenty one years you have walked this Earth, now this number is but nine, each roll of the dice shall restore more of what you have lost."

Laura goes pale as the room seems to grow around her as she skips straight past high and middle school and straight to elementary. Her oversized clothes and make up now give Laura the appearance of a girl playing dress up with her mommy's things.

She carefully restores the dice to their case cursing her carelessness. Once that is done she sheepishly moves her search to the children's clothing. Here she finds an outfit that makes her feel every bit the young girl she now is with princess undies, a pair of sturdy play jeans, shirt depicting Elsa from Frozen, matching shoes that light up with each step, and a bright pink coat.

She puts the dice in her new coat's pocket and makes sure to zip it shut. Then she exists the room and makes her way to the bathroom where she washes off her make up. With that done she looks up to see what even to her looks to be a child young enough to warrant an early bed time and plenty of adult supervision. Feeling light headed she wonders how she could ever hope to get out of this situation now.
1223.title: Go to look for clothes only to accidentally rol...

choices: Steal an unlocked bike from the bike rack
SE
12232.content:
Laura decides her only hope to make it out of this situation was to find that shop ASAP. Peering out from the bathroom she sees the library is mostly empty. Keeping a careful eye out for passing adults, she makes her way over the the computers. Wincing with each step as her new shoes announce each step with flashing lights. She can't help but feel like she is a misbehaving child afraid of getting caught.

After putting the address in she is relieved to find it is only around a mile away, though even that is daunting in her current state.

Regardless, she now at least knew where her objective was. Now all that remained is how to get there. She would have to be careful otherwise she runs the risk of being mistaken for a lost child. Though if used right that might be a good tool.
12232.title: Sneak over to the library computers to search f...

choices: Laura climbs out a window in the room
SE
122321.content:
Spotting a bike rike by the entrance, Laura walked over to see if there were any she could make use of. It wouldn't be as fast as driving but it would definitely beat walking.

She located an unlocked bike that was a good size for her new proportions. As she pulled it from the rack she worried the owner may return at any minute and rushed to get going. She should have taken the time to get used to staying balanced in her altered form.

Almost as soon as Lauea starts moving she loses her balance. She falls to the ground and as she does she feels the handle bar catch on her coat. The coat tears and the dice clatter free once again.

"No!"

"Nine years you have walked this Earth. Now this number is but four. Each roll of the dice returns more of what you have lost."

As Laura struggles to her feet the childish outfit, that were have been tiny compared to her normal clothes and fit snuggly on her 9 year old form, becomes tent like on her ever shrinking body. She wasn't sure whether the desire to cry was her own or a sign of her newfound toddlerhood.

"Don't panic. Get the dice, get new clothes, get to the magic store."

The words were meant to help her focus, but her them reaching her ears in a preschooler's voice was not comforting. Laura pulled herself together and managed to collect the dice and return to the clothing room. As she shut the door, she heard people going to investigate the toppled bike.

She had no difficulties stepping out of the clothes that she knew could only seem mature compared to whatever she was about to end up in. All the tables were tall enough that now she had to stand on her tippy toes just to see the contents.

She found underwear first, she thought the material felt weird before realizing they were thicker and absorbent so if a child had an accident in her "big girl" undies there wouldn't be a mess. Pulling them up her now tiny frame felt like taking another step or two back. Next, she found a shirt that said "Mommy's little princess" and a pair of denim overalls. She put them on and slid the dice case into the big pocket on the front. Finally, for shoes she found a smaller size of the same ones she had been wearing previously. She found it oddly comforting being able to find something acceptable for "big kids" in her size.

Dressed in her new clothes Laura was afraid of what she would see if she looked in a mirror now. She put her ear to the door and heard multiple people over by the entrance. She imagined, even if they would believe a 9 year old was ok to leave on her own, they wouldn't let a four year old "wander off". How was she going to get to the magic shop now?
122321.title: Should have gone with training wheels

choices: She spots a daycare that is closed for the day
Nowhere to stop, she’s gotta try and hold it
She just goes behind a bush
1223211.content:
Laura turns around to examine the room for possible exits. A window catches her eye. Facing away from the front of the building, it should lead away from anyone looking for a would be bike bandit.

She manages to pull herself onto an adjacent table and push open the window. She attempts to carefully climb down from but her grip proves too weak. Instead she falls hard into her bottom, partially cushioned by her new undergarment. Choking back tears she rises unsteadily to her feet.

Taking stock of the massive world she now found herself in, she considered the best route to her destination. She would surely be spotted walking down major roads, which meant cutting through the nearby neighborhood would be the only real option. She would have to be careful still though or risk being caught by a resident.

First making sure the coast was clear, she heads to the rear of the library and makes her way across the street. Once in the neighborhood she sticks to streets with the most trees, bushes, and other features that might hide her. Having to take such an indirect route and finding each step moves her only a tiny distance, Laura's progress is far too slow for her liking. But at least for now her plan seems to be working. Unfortunately, as she walks she begins to feel a great deal of pressure in her shrunken bladder. Still quite a distance from her destination Laura worries she won't be able to hold it all the way.
1223211.title: Laura climbs out a window in the room

choices: She wakes up to an accident
She accidentally rolls the dice in her sleep
She wakes up the next morning
12232111.content:
As Laura begins to panic, she spots a daycare center with an empty parking lot. It was hardly her first choice, but it sure as hell beat having an accident. Almost at a full sprint now, she rushes to the entrance and finds her first bit of luck for the day. Someone had apparently forgotten to lock the door when they left.

Slipping inside she made her way to the first toilet she could locate, a toddler training potty. She undoes the buckles on her overalls and pulls them and her underwear down just in time. Almost the instant she sits down she feels her bladder give way. As she sits, Laura wonders how she went from a business professional to a toddler seconds away from not making it to the potty in such a short amount of time.

Once she feels the urine flow stop she cleans herself up and pulls back up her clothes. Making her way to wash her hands at a nearby sink that was part of a snack station, she feels her stomach growl. With all that happened she forgot she never actually ate dinner. Figuring she was already there, Laura helps herself to what remained of the day's snack; a juice box, a bag of animal crackers, and a banana. It wasn't what she would call fine dining but it was better than nothing.

Laura brings her "dinner" over to what appeared to be mats for nap time and plops down. As she eats she feels the adrenaline that had kept her going fade. Feeling completely drained she doubts she will be able to make it the rest of the way without resting. Laying down she closes her eyes vowing to only rest for a few minutes. Promptly as any young child resisting bed time, she falls asleep.
12232111.title: She spots a daycare that is closed for the day

choices: Hunker down until it’s warm outside
Whoops, drops the dice.
122321111.content:
Laura opens her eyes groggily. She finds herself with a number of things to process. First, the sight of the brightly colored room initially confused her before the memory of the day's events came back to her. Second, she found she had been sucking her thumb. Finally, she felt something strange and warm against her butt and back. She couldn't figure it out until she smelled it and remembered she only peed when she arrived.

Laura feels absolutely mortified, here she was waking up after a nap in a daycare having soiled herself. If she didn't feel like a toddler before she definitely did now.

As she moves to stand up she feels the mess spreading. She looks around for somewhere to clean up and finds a changing room with a deep sink that looks to be for this exact situation. Removing the dice case from her overalls she sets it down on one of the tables before pulling off her now ruined clothes.

After disposing of those, she climbs into the sink and does her best to rinse herself off. Feeling sufficiently clean, she finds climbing out of the sink soaking wet much harder than getting in was. After more than a couple slips she manages to hoist herself over the edge and stumble to the floor.

Now she once again found herself on the hunt for replacement clothes. Her shoes at least were still clean. Her heart skips a beat when she realized the only underwear available was disposable training pants. Even after the humiliation she just endured, putting on something so close to a diaper felt like a new low.

As she moves to exit the changing room to search for any other clothes, she freezes when she catches sight of her reflection in the mirror deeply unsettled by what she saw. The brown haired toddler with her flashing shoes and pink training pants looks as perfectly at home in the daycare as her adult self does in her office.

Tearing her eyes away from the image she returned to her search. After searching everywhere she could reach, the best she came up was a Disney princess costume from a toy chest. Now at least dressed, Laura looks to a clock on the wall and finds out the time is just past midnight.

"Great," she thinks. Not only would the store probably be closed, her new outfit was hardly warm enough to be comfortable outside for long and she has no pockets to put the dice in.
122321111.title: She wakes up to an accident

choices: Passes by a park and can’t resist stopping to play
Gets spotted
1223211111.content:
Sighing Laura realizes there's not much of a choice. As much as she wants to leave this place it was hardly the wisest course of action. But how was she supposed to kill the time?

Her gaze drifts to the assorted toys, she wants to reject the idea outright. But when the alternative is sitting and staring at a wall it looks more inviting.

At first Laura only half heartedly stacks some blocks trying to make a tall tower, but when she accidentally knocks it over she finds herself burst into giggles. After that she only gets more invested in her playtime completely losing track of time. She also adds to her outfit a princess tiara, a fairy wand, and a temporary butterfly tattoo on her cheek. By the time the sun starts to rise, she's set up a pretend tea party with dolls and stuffed animals, giving each their own voice and personality.

As the sunlight passes through to window, Laura is shocked to realize has much she had gotten into the role. She is further shocked when she realizes at some point she had unknowingly wet herself.

"This isn't me I'm a grown woman not a little girl who can't keep track of time or who forgets to use the potty. I need to get to that magic shop now."

She grabs a discarded backpack she had found during the night and carefully placed the dice inside. Then removes the wet training pant, whipes herself down, and pulls up a fresh pair. As a precaution, she puts a few extra pairs and a pack of whipes in the backpack as well. She then heads out the front door and, seeing a car start to pull into the driveway, bolts behind the building, hoping she wasn't seen, before starting back on the path towards the magic shop.
1223211111.title: Hunker down until it’s warm outside

choices: Laura realizes she’s hungry
Alright, enough fooling around. Time to get going.
12232111111.content:
At first, Laura once again finds herself creeping down empty streets and hiding behind bushes. The urgency she felt even just back in the daycare is fading though. Sure, she dropped a lot of years so quickly at the start and that had left her rightfully panicked, but it was rushing that caused her last bit of shrinking. Besides the dice are safely secured now so there's nothing to worry about.

Her steps slowly became less cautious and less pointed towards her destination. She soon discovers how fun it is to twirl in her dress as she walks. The worry that embracing her inner, and now outer, child is gone. After all, she knows she's really a grownup and is going to get her age back soon enough, so why not enjoy her brief revisit to her childhood?

Soon something catches her eye, a park with a massive children's area. There's a massive playscape with swings, slides, tunnels, bridges, and all other sorts of things. Laura doesn't really put much thought into her decision to stop.

The whole area is pretty well fenced in so she doesn't feel like there's much risk of getting spotted anyway. She stows the backpack behind some bushes and makes her way over to a swing. Sitting down, she feels the padding of her training pants cushion her butt, and brushes aside any feelings of embarrassment that would have caused her earlier easily.

Pumping her legs as hard as she can, the swing propels her a distance into the air that would have been negligible in her normal body, but now makes her feel as if she's flying high above the ground. Once she's had her fill of the swing she jumps off. Still giddy, she runs over to explore other areas of the playscape.
12232111111.title: Passes by a park and can’t resist stopping to...

choices: Laura realizes she needs to potty
Laura leaves after playing in the bouncy castle.
122321111111.content:
Laura is running across a swaying bridge when she feels her stomach growl. She sits down kicking her legs idily as she tries to remember the last proper meal she had.

Definitely too long ago, she concludes. But how was a toddler with no money supposed to get a meal? What if she went back to daycare? Wait did she really consider that? That's definitely not going to happen. She'll just have to keep moving and keep an eye out for an opportunity.

After climbing back to her feet and making her way down the structure, Laura retrieves her backpack and gets back on the road. Shortly after, Laura has her attention drawn to a particularly crowded one.

As she walks down it, she sees a house with a bouncy castle and a big sign with balloons reading "Happy 4th birthday Carly!" out front. Moving closer, she can now see plenty of kids running around and grownups mostly talking amongst themselves. That seems promising to her, it looks packed enough that one extra attendee stopping for food won't draw any attention.

She makes her way over trying to slip in unnoticed and seemingly succeeds. She then helps herself to some pizza and finds a seat at a table crowded with other kids her age. They at least don't seem suspicious of the new arrival. Laura quickly finds herself an active participant in their discussions about princesses, cartoons, and other matters that interest her new peers. Once she's done eating she is asked to play over to the bouncy castle and happily accepts. She leaves her backpack at the table and follows after her new friends.
122321111111.title: Laura realizes she’s hungry

choices: Laura eats her cake and leaves
Laura makes a mess of herself
1223211111111.content:
Laura finds the bouncy castle even more fun than the park had been. After a while though she starts to feel the need to poop and makes her way to the exit. As she exits the bouncy castle, she sees she's been at this party far longer than expected. After she's done, she should probably get back on the path to the magic shop.

She makes her way back to the table and is relieved to find her bag where she left it. After picking it up she makes her way into the house. There she is greeted by a grownup, the mommy of the birthday girl Laura guesses.

"Hi sweetie, what are you doing in here?"

"I gotta go potty." Something about the way she said that feels off to Laura, but she doesn't worry about it too much.

"And you're going all by yourself? What a big girl! You're mommy and daddy must be very proud."

Laura finds herself beaming at the compliment, "Uh huh!"

"Here I'll show you where it is."

Laura follows her to the bathroom. The grownup steps in and places a child seat cushion on the toilet then steps out.

"Let me know if you need any help ok?"

"I can do it by myself. I'm a big girl."

The grownup laughs and closes the door. Laura pulls down her training pants and climbs onto the toilet. As she sits, Laura looks at her backpack and realizes she didn't check to see if the dice were in there when she grabbed it. It didn't look like it had been messed with but she didn't want to risk leaving without them. She opens the pocket and is relieved to see the case is still there. Pulling the case out she decides to open it to make sure the dice weren't removed. The case opens with a pop and one of the dice falls on the ground. Laura covers her eyes and waits.

"Four years you have walked this Earth. Now this number is but three. Each roll of the dice returns more of what you have lost."

Laura almost loses her balance as she shrinks another few inches. Why did she have to open the case? She's sposed to be a big girl and big girls are smarter than that! Once she finishes with the potty she climbs down and picks up the loose die returning it and the case to the backpack.

As she stands up straight, Laura sees her dress is now loose and goes a bit further down her body than before. Sighing, she decides she really needs to get to that magic shop.

She pulls up her training pants and is dismayed to find they slide right back down. She steps out of them and briefly considers going without underwear, before she remembers the accident that led her to wearing the training pants to begin with. If she ruins her clothes again she'll be in trouble.

She looks around to see if there's anything here that will fit her. She finds a box of training pants and tries a pair on but they're too big too. As she goes to put the pair back, she notices a box of diapers beneath the training pants. They're smaller probably left over from before Carly started potty training. Laura is unhappy with the idea of putting on something so babyish. She's thinking of whether or not to put them on when there's a knock on the door.

"Sweetie, do you need any help?"

"Nu uh!"

She doesn't have time to think about it. She turns on the sink then lays down and tapes the diaper in place, finding it to be a perfect fit. She hurridly shoves the training pants from her bag into the box and replaces them with diapers. Then she quickly rinses off her hands, turns of the sink, and opens the door.

"Wow you did do it all by yourself and you remembered to wash your hands! You are a big girl!"

Laura blushes she doesn't feel like much of a big girl anymore. At least the grown up doesn't seem to notice her shrinkage. Laura heads back outside and prepares to make her exit when the grownup takes her hand and leads her back to the tables.

"Wait here sweetie it's almost time for cake!"

Laura obediently follows the grownup's command and figures some cake might make her feel better anyway. Soon she finds the rest of the attendees gathered around the table. Laura pouts when she realizes all the kids she was playing with earlier are bigger than her now and figures none of them are probably wearing diapers either. At least after the birthday girl blows out the candles Laura gets her slice of cake.
1223211111111.title: Laura realizes she needs to potty

choices: Laura makes it to the magic shop
Laura soon realizes the cake was a bad idea and has explosive diarrhea
Laura gets distracted by another babyish or toddler desire
Laura gets spotted
Laura finds the magic store... WITH A TWIST!
12232111111111.content:
Laura would smile as she got the cake, but her mind would immediately return to her quest... but she felt that it could wait until after as she cutely devoured the cake like the toddler she now was... burping softly as she finished and rubbing her tummy in happiness. She then decided to get ready to leave as she stood up and began to sneak out... thankfully being able to do so as the birthday girl ate their cake and they all were opening presents.

Again, the toddler girl would waddle down the neighborhood from bush to bush hoping she made it to her destination... the toddler rubbing her tummy and licking her lips as she did so cutely smiling. She loved the cake... maybe she should stay like this? Feels alot better then being old and gre-

Wait a minute, No! That’s the regression talking... the toddler girl would shake her head and sigh continuing forward as she hoped to god she could just make it and finally be back to normal... out of diapers and everything.
12232111111111.title: Laura eats her cake and leaves

choices: In her sleep, Laura knocks over the bag and along with it... the dice.
Laura has a accident in her sleep, again.
Laura awakens to no problems... but she feels the need to play again
Laura awakens and it turns out the family is there now... somehow.
Laura wakes up, theres no issues and she immediately heads on her way again
122321111111113.content:
Laura would walk onwards towards the Magic Shop, realizing very quickly that her previous adventures had resulted in her time being through and through wasted... when she initially set out the sun had just rose and now it looked as though it was around afternoon. The toddler would sigh as she felt the diaper crinkle as she walked, abit agitated that it was her fault she was in this issue as she moved from bush to bush avoiding sight...

That was until she felt herself start to yawn cutely and she pretty much knew at once she was starting to fall to the habits of a toddler, sure she had boatloads of energy... but she almost certainly needed a nap after all that playing and sugar from her cake had worn off. The toddler would continue to move forward, but the yawns became more frequent and soon Laura would find herself unable to keep herself awake as she fell onto her padded butt cutely passing out for a moment. Before she immediately awoke and caught herself.... she knew passing out in a bush was a bad idea even with her regression making some semblances of her adult sense degrade, she knew she needed to find a safe place to rest.

At once the tired toddler would poke her head out from the bush she rested in, the party house was a decent ways away... being at the near start of the neighborhood she was in... as well as the various houses seemed full of activity... all save for one, which seemed empty. With caution, the toddler would toddle over towards it and thankfully not be seen as they entered its backyard through a hole in the fence that only a small animal or toddler could fit through... seemed that her luck today was pretty awesome as she examined her environment around her, finding a small playground of swings, slides and various toys to play with... and a patio leading to a clearly locked door. However! It possessed a doggie door which a small toddler could probably fit through... and she did! Though it was a tight fit she managed to get inside backpack and all to find a relatively decent home, if abit dusty...

The now toddler could clearly find this place was a temporary home for a family some ways away from here, finding some letters and such dated from the last summer... it also seemed as though they had kids around the more, infantile ages... so she’d be safe to stay here and maybe even have some changes past the diapers she took. Regardless of this... the toddler quickly searched for a bedroom, which she found one in the form of a little girl’s room with a crib and a Pink toddlers bed... immediately crawling up into the toddlers bed, taking off all her clothes except the diaper she now wore and placing the backpack next to her before passing out throughly covered up as she did so cutely sucking on her thumb, unware of what would happen when she woke.
122321111111113.title: Laura needs a nap

choices: She attempts to stand on something to get to the door and open it
She tries to see if she can open the window to the backyard
She gets distracted as she finds out she was right to wear the diaper...
She decides it’s late anyways as she can deal with it in the morning
1223211111111131.content:
Laura tosses and turns during her sleep. Dreaming of losing the last of her remaining years and fading away completely. As she does she knocks the bag over and the dice case falls out of the bag and with it the dice tumble out and fall to the ground. If she was awake. Laura would have watched in terror as the dice rolled out.

"Three years you have walked this Earth. Now this number is but one. Each roll of the dice returns more of what you have lost."

Laura wakes a few hours later. As she wipes drool off her face the reality of the situation immediately returns to her. But she also feels something is even more wrong than before as she struggles to climb to her feet finding her limbs are not quite as cooperative as they should be and her clothes felt looser. When she looks down to see the loose dice displaying snake eyes, she feels both terror at how few years she must have left and relief she had apparently gotten the best possible result.

As she tries to take a step forward, her ill fitting diaper seem to work against her, tripping her and she topples to the ground. Almost immediately she bursts into tears. Without thinking, she finds herself picking up a nearby pacifier and sticking it in her mouth.

As she sucks on this newfound source of comfort, she realizes she's going to need another wardrobe downgrade. With some difficulty she manages to kick off the diaper and remove her now useless garment. Taking the first unsteady step in search of something new, she imagines in her current state she would fit right in with all the embarrassing baby photos her parents had shown her friends over the years.

Immediately, the infant would find walking to be a horrific task... she could take very small... unsteady steps but anything further would result in her falling on her bare butt and sobbing quietly through her pacifier. However, with this new handicap in mind she did manage to make it over to the next side of the room and find some diapers appropriate for her new size... thankfully it seemed as if these people had left diapers for a one year old child which she would clearly need now, if she had trouble making it to the potty before... now she would most definitely have some. The infant would lay down on the diaper and immediately try to strap it up, finding it difficult with her arms being so stubby but ultimately she managed to do so thanks to the fact she was still. The infant would then find the only item of clothing leftover that she could reach in the drawers, a heavily padded sleep to match her now heavily padded diaper which took even more effort to put on. The one year old now looked the part fully, clad in a thick sleeper and diaper... Laura would frown a she looked at herself in the mirror, her toddler hair had pretty much been reduced to some infantile pigtails which barely left her head, and unlike before... there was no way she could hide her diaper like before, as it bulged out from every side in the sleeper. Regardless, the now baby girl had bigger issues as she went to pick up the dice without dropping it, immediately finding it a challenge as she had some of the worst hand eye coordination possible, but regardless she eventually managed and knowing her mistake now... she put the bag, and the dice case in the diaper drawer... pushing it closed with clear effort and readying herself to leave...

To which she found a problem. In her current state she couldn’t reach doors well at all... and while the toddlers room was open when she first came in she now found it shut... probably unintentionally due to wind. The infant girl tried as she might she couldn’t reach it and in frustration she muttered a single word...

“Poopie.”

Before immediately sitting down and trying to think of a way out of her situation.
1223211111111131.title: In her sleep, Laura knocks over the bag and alo...

choices: Her diaper leaked
She heard noises, she wasn’t alone in the house now
She was losing adult knowledge
12232111111111313.content:
Laura would sit there for a few moments before pouting cutely through her newfound pacifier, she knew pretty immediately she couldn’t get that door open as a one year old who barely could walk let alone have the strength to open doors, she already struggled at age three prior so the thought of a one year old doing so was laughable. Despite this, the infant felt she needed to try as she looked around, but then quickly became distracted as her eyes looked dead at a pile of baby toys.

The infantile mind of Laura immediately pulled away all thoughts otherwise, her attention span seemingly having regressed with her as she made a crawl over to the toy pile with a very large and happy smile on her face as she grabbed onto the toys, nibbling and playing with them for a long while. Eventually however, Laura would frown abit as she stood up and felt a pressure in her lower regions... it felt familar but in her infantile state the one year old decided that it would probably just pass as she continued to toddle around cutely.

This was not the case, the pressure eventually increased at a steady rate... before finally Laura would snap out of her infantile stupor and playing to realize way too late what was happening as she felt a hot, soild mass of baby poop fill her diaper, causing it to sag downwards as she filled it... within moments of this, she would also feel her infantile bladder start to soak her diaper from the front a she blushed heavily and sucked on her pacifier, trying to mask the fact she had the first daytime accident in over 40+ years... however while this was a problem... they soon found this the least of their worries... soon...
12232111111111313.title: She gets distracted as she finds out she was ri...

choices: Uh oh! Need to go potty...
Laura tripped the alarm system
She gets back to business
122321111111114.content:
After wandering aimlessly for a while, Laura happens upon a house she recognizes. It's the home of one of her coworkers Liz. She's out of town with her husband and daughter, but Laura does remember where she keeps the spare key. She could hopefully use Liz's computer to find the store again.

She locates the fake rock, pops out the key, and let's herself inside. She removes her shoes and finds her feet are very sore both from walking so far and because she had been walking in shoes that were now too large. She takes off her socks to make sure her feet didn't have any injuries. They looked alright and Laura found the cold tile floor against the bare skin soothing so she left the socks off.

Looking around, the sight of a home set up for someone her current age is odd. She didn't really get to appreciate it back at the party with the mommy hovering over her. Whether it be high chairs, or scattered toys, or sippy cups she can see just how different a life in her current form is from the one she is used to. It's unsettling but she also can't help but feel a little comforted at the idea grown ups would take care of all the important stuff while she could be carefree.

Laura brings her focus back to the task at hand and makes her way up the stairs to Liz's office, but finds the door shut and locked. Frustrated, Laura begins searching the rest of the house for any sort of device she could use to find the magic shop. In Liz's daughter's room, Laura is excited to find a tablet but as she tries to use it she finds that parental controls block everything but learning games.

Laura tries to find a way to turn the parental controls off, but has no luck. Eventually, she decides to try out one of the games, hoping taking a minute to destress would provide clarity. She soon finds herself completely engrossed in the game. After a while she sets down the tablet and decides to look around the room more.

She comes across a mirror and is curious to see the exact state she had been reduced to. She can't help but giggle at the sight of the toddler clad in a too big princess dress and a tiara.

She's curious to see if she could make the effect more even more extreme. First, she removes the tiara and instead uses pink ribbons to tie her hair into pigtails. Next, she finds a pacifier and sticks it in her mouth, finding the sucking motion to be quite pleasant. Then, she pulls off the dress. Finally, she finds a ruffle rump diaper cover and pulls it up. Examining her handiwork, she doubted anyone could ever guess that she was actually a grown woman.
122321111111114.title: Laura finds a familiar place

choices: Find a way to the magic shop still
Find someone to give the dice too
Find some help
1223211111111141.content:
Laura feels the need to pee approaching. Relieved to still have some level of control, she cuts her fashion show short and heads to the bathroom. Once inside she rips off her diaper and climbs on the potty and falls right through the seat. She hoists herself back out and relieves her bladder.

Butt still damp, she goes to retrieve a fresh diaper when she decides to try something out first. She fills the tub with water and bubble bath soap then strips and climbs in. With the tub is almost like a swimming pool in her current state, she finds delight in splashing in the bubbles and playing with the assorted bath toys. Once her fingers start to prune up, she pulls the plug from the drain and climbs out.

She opens her bag to retrieve a fresh diaper, but finds the dice case still sitting on top. She grabs the case to move it aside, but with her hands still wet it slips from her fingers and to the floor. Once more the spirit's voice rings out.

"Three years you have walked this Earth. Now this number is but one. Each roll of the dice returns more of what you have lost. Be warned you have no more years left to regain. Give the dice to a new bearer or risk the consquences."

Laura only barely has time to process that warning before she feels her legs give out as she falls to her butt. She feels like she should cry about the situation, but instead she bursts into babyish laughter, partly muffled by the pacifier still in her mouth. She tried so hard to stay grown up and now here she was the furthest from it. The comedic irony overwhelms any sour feelings she should have.

Once she calms down, she sets about collecting the dice. With them in hand, she looks at the flimsy case that had failed so many times already and decides she needs a new container. She takes unsteady steps around the bathroom looking for something when she finds an open child proof bottle in the garbage. After stuffing it with toilet paper, she places the dice inside and seals the lid. She then sits down and tries to twist it back open with no hint of it budging.

Satisfied the odds of them coming loose again are minimal, she considers the cool feeling of the tiles against her exposed butt. She sets the dice down and, after a few more awkward steps, crawls back to the nursery. She locates a pack of smaller diapers easily and, with somewhat more difficulty, tapes it on. Examining herself in the mirror once again, she sees a helpless baby staring back and wonders just what options she had left now.
1223211111111141.title: Uh oh! Need to go potty...

choices: Laura wakes up
Something (or someone) wakes Laura up
12232111111111411.content:
Laura's come too far to give up now. She returns to her abandoned search of the house and locates a key to the office in Liz's bedside table. Using it turns out to be quite the challenge in her current state, but she manages it and enters the office.

She climbs into the desk chair. The computer thankfully doesn't have a password, so Laura is able to look up the store. Unfortunately, she learns she has only made it a little over halfway since leaving the library. If she's going to make it she'll need to be fully rested, fed, and dressed first. She prints the directions and puts them with the dice.

First she attends to food. Managing the stairs is no small feet, but she succeeds in reaching the bottom without incident. By throwing her whole body weight against the door, she pushes open the fridge and finds several bottles labeled breast milk. She shivers at the thought of drinking it but decides to be practical. She takes one bottle and makes her way back up the stairs.

She returns to the nursery and places the bottle in a bottle warmer. After a few minutes, the bottle warmer beeps and she removes the bottle. Seeing the side of the crib was down, Laura climbs up to take her nap. Once she's inside she grabs the side for support and inadvertently presses a button. The open side slides up and knocks Laura off her feet. She looks up to see the mobile start spinning and hear soothing music playing.

Deciding to worry about getting out later, she removes her pacifier and starts drinking from the bottle. The warm milk and the music combine to almost instantly put her to sleep.
12232111111111411.title: Find a way to the magic shop still

choices: “I-I dun’t mind a big sissy!” (Stay with Magic Shop Owner)
“Keep mah job and be young? Sounds wike best option.” (Toddler Businesswoman)
122321111111115.content:
Laura would finally make it to the magic shop, toddling over in excitement she would immediately attempt to open the door which took all of her strength to do... but she managed to do so as she saw a woman behind the counter who looked to be about 16ish at most. She eyed the toddlerized girl and smirked abit before bluntly stating, “So, you found the youth dice eh? Well you are free to return them but I might got some bad news for ya.”.

Then the girl would point to a slot to place items that aren’t wanted anymore... to which the toddler would hastily go to put the dice in. Them echoing in her head one last time.

“The bond of the dice of youth has been broken, enjoy what has been returned to you.”

To which the Toddler would respond with a sigh of relief before looking up to the desk lady and asking, “Me wanna change back now...” in a soft voice.

To which the girl behind the front desk would frown and state to the little girl. “Sorry kiddo, no can do. There is no getting back what you no longer have. Trust me, I know... I’m the owner of this store... and before I unbound myself from those infernal die I was about left at your current age. Thankfully though, I’m growing up again...”

Laura would immediately frown at this and looks ready to cry, but the Owner immediately reassures her young toddler friend with a smile and more words in response. “Hey now... no need to get all teary eyed. I got you covered. I can make this... somewhat normal. In that whatever life you have you can keep... just with the added benefit of being 3... if thats what you want. Or you are free to just hang around here and work for me! I mean... it does get lonely around here, and I’ve always wanted a little sister...”

Immediately Laura’s eyes would widen as she debated her two presented options, toddling back and forth as her diaper crinkled underneath her cutely. What to do... what to do...
122321111111115.title: Laura finds the magic store... WITH A TWIST!

choices: Climbs out yet another open window
Freezes in place, she needed to go potty again
Start to tire again, your new baby body wasn't used to all this stress
122321112.content:
Laura tosses and turns during her sleep. Dreaming of losing the last of her remaining years and fading away completely. As she does the dice case works it's way out of the pocket and falls to the ground. If she was awake. Laura would have watched in terror as the dice rolled out.

"Four years you have walked this Earth. Now this number is but two. Each roll of the dice returns more of what you have lost."

Laura wakes a few hours later. As she wipes drool off her face the reality of the situation immediately returns to her. But she also feels something is even more wrong than before as she struggles to climb to her feet finding her limbs are not quite as cooperative as they should be and her clothes felt looser. When she looks down to see the loose dice displaying snake eyes, she feels both terror at how few years she must have left and relief she had apparently gotten the best possible result.

As she tries to take a step forward, her ill fitting clothes seem to work against her and she topples to the ground. Almost immediately she bursts into tears. Without thinking, she finds herself picking up a nearby pacifier and sticking it in her mouth.

As she sucks on this newfound source of comfort, she realizes she's going to need another wardrobe downgrade. With some difficulty she manages to undo the buckles on the overalls and remove her now useless outfit. Taking the first unsteady step in search of something new, she imagines in her current state she would fit right in with all the embarrassing baby photos her parents had shown her friends over the years.

She manages to make her way to the changing room and locate the only underwear available for someone her new age. Laying down, she does her best to tape the diaper in place. As she rises back to her feet she finds it to further reduce her walking ability and falls to her butt. Sucking the pacifier harder to dispel the approaching tears, she gets back to her feet and toddles over to a bin of spare clothes. She finds a set of pink footie pajamas covered in rainbows and unicorns in her size and puts it on.

Returning to the nap area, gathering the dice proves far more difficult a task than she expected, as her hand eye coordination and balance had regressed along with her, but in the end she succeeds at returning them to the case safely. She places the case inside a teddy bear backpack with an attached toddler leash.

With her only hope being reaching the magic store, Laura makes her way to the entrance and pushes the door, which does not budge an inch. Laura feels fresh tears whelling up as she considers this development.
122321112.title: Laura is running out of years...

choices: The next morning she awakens and it’s a weekend.(No Daycare Paterons or workers)
The next morning she awakens and its a weekday.(Daycare People show up)
She wakes up later and finally notices the open window
1223211122.content:
Laura would try to push the door open to no avail, it seems as though she was potentially stuck as a two year old in diapers and a onesie for at least the rest of the night... she’d have to wait til morning... but that was the least of her worries she would soon find.

As Laura would awkwardly toddle back to her nap mat and sit down she would soon find something she didn’t notice when she was trying to open the door... her bladder and bowels were aching and the two year old former business woman would set down her teddy bear backpack and stand up once more, holding her padded crotch as she tried to toddle over to the potty she had used mere moments ago as a bigger girl. Of course, given the diaper in between her legs and the awkwardness of her steps she would soon find herself back on her bottom after merely two steps and would groan as she got on all fours, crawling to the potty as fast as she could.

Laura would crawl and crawl... feeling her bladder start to loosen about halfway there, a large squirt of pee being ejected before she somehow miraculously managed to stop herself but at the cost of her needed to focus to hold it as she felt the now slightly damp wet spot of the diaper rub against her. She would slowly begin to crawl again cutely, her bladder and bowels near full to bursting still and her toddler control even worse then it had been when she was 4. As the girl crawled she fell victim to two more squirts, this time them being less major... but still dampening her diaper a fair amount and making the Business Woman feel more and more flustered at her inability to hold it.

Finally, after what seemed like hours the 2 year old would make it to the potty she had used before, quickly standing up she would again feel another squirt hit her diaper before she stopped it... this time it was quite a long one and her diaper felt positively soaked in the front... but regardless she still felt she could somewhat make it as she unzipped her onesie, trying her hardest not to poop or pee more as she did so leaving her again clad in only her diaper as she went to grab the tapes but her bowels could no longer hold and neither could her bladder. As she made a grab for the tapes she felt herself squat down and the toddler felt her bladder start to let go again as she grunted. With quick thinking, the former business woman would rip off the diaper as fast as she could, pee still flowing as she managed to squat and eventually sit on the toddler potty which... was now as big as she was... and do her business as she filled the potty with a massive poopy and a small bit of pee sighing in relief.

As the toddler pooped on the training potty she looked down to her diaper and frowned abit. She had clearly not made it there dry... and that showed with her clearly soaked diaper and the puddle in front of her potty. It was clear once she hit the road again she would need diapers... or she would ruin her clothes. She would think on this for some time, before finally finishing and grabbing alot of wipes wiping herself down as best she could with her bad hand/eye coordination and balance... before awkwardly toddling to her clothes and getting a new diaper... since her old one was soaked. She would then repeat the steps and once again stand as a diapered two year old girl in a pink unicorn onesie, sighing in defeat and once again tired after unleashing a massive poopy... she would toddle awkwardly over to the nap mat before passing out on top of it with her butt in the air again... cutely falling asleep.
1223211122.title: Freezes in place, she needed to go potty again

choices: The window was open
There were toys to play with
That breakfast shake was a bad idea...
12232111221.content:
Laura would awaken to birds chirping in the distance and give a long stretch outwards as she did so yawning cutely in her toddler voice with a clear frown, she wasn’t dreaming before... she was really a toddler girl in a unicorn onesie and worse even, a diaper. The toddler would quickly feel her diaper as she ran that unfortunate fact in her head and would find herself dry, she had pretty much cleared herself out the previous day and that seemingly resulted in her not going potty over the night in her newfound diaper. The toddler felt groggy and shaky legged as she stood once more and took a few uneven steps off her mat... finally getting used to walking somewhat like this, albeit with alot of difficulty as she turned her attention towards her morning needs.

First things first, the toddler would check for a calendar... which she would find on the wall showing the various dates and the like, which came with a shock to the toddler! She was having trouble reading the calendar... which worried her greatly as she felt it meant her adult abilities were starting to regress as well... but she could still thankfully read with some effort. It was there she found that it was a Saturday, and thankfully it looked as if she’d be fine to lounge here until she could find another way out. At her height she would curse herself thinking it to probably take a long while... But she couldn’t give up hope!

After she saw the date, she would proceed to look for something to eat for breakfast, to which she stumbled into the open and unlocked door of the staff room (seriously, this place needed better employees.). The toddler would feel happy as she dug into the fridge and found a neglected breakfast shake and some cereal bars in the fridge... sure it wasn’t the best of breakfast meals but hey it was better then nothing as she quickly grabbed it up and went back to the mat with her meal once again til the prizes she found lay as nothing but crumbs and an empty bottle.

After finishing her breakfast, the toddler girl would pat her tummy in satisfaction before looking around for something to do, to which the young one would find in kind...
12232111221.title: The next morning she awakens and it’s a weeke...

choices: Noticed the bathroom door was open, maybe they’ll have a way to get clean?
Noticed someone was here now... and they definitely noticed her
Ran out of juice again, passing out cutely in her messy diaper
Tried to clean herself up, though it’s hard
122321112213.content:
Laura would sit down on her mat, now full to bursting as she frowned trying to think of something to do but failing as she realized the daycare provided her with little options, she saw a TV but it was not on... and she would have to look for a remote which she would eventually sigh and decide to do since it wasn’t like she could leave in the state she was in after all. The toddler would make large toddles around as she looked for the remote, this taking up a large chunk of time... about 30 minutes before she finally found the remote with a big smile on her face muttering in a cute toddler’s lisp, “Woo... Finawi! Foun TV!” Before holding her mouth shut and frowning at her now regressed vocal patterns before toddling over to the TV.

She would do so and sit down on a bean bag chair as she flipped on the TV, only to find the only channels they got were kiddie channels... as expected of a daycare, but having nothing else to do Laura would pick up her pacifier, sit on the Bean Bag chair and watch the various cartoons as they flashed on the TV...

The toddler would do so for about 2 more hours, slightly dozing off as she did so until she felt a sudden gurgle and a knot in her tummy hit her at full force... and that’s when she regretted her choice to drink the breakfast shake and immediately stood up, fast toddling to her potty, her bum erupting with loud farts that seemed more and more close to releasing something. The toddler had forgotten in her hunger that she was highly lactose intolerant and as a result the breakfast shake and her breakfast were now mere moments away from unleashing into her diaper. The toddler tried and tried but as she made it to her napping mat from the Bean Bag chair... she knew it was all too late as she felt her knees involuntarily squat and it was all over.

The toddler would feel absolutely disgusted as a brown, liquid mess filled her diaper from behind in a long continuous stream. The toddler would groan in absolute pain, having explosive diarrhea in a diaper for the first time in little over 40 years... and feeling absolutely disgusted and mortified for it. She felt the poop soon be followed with a rush of urine into her diaper, sagging the diaper further and making the designs start to fade as the toddler would start to pull off her onesie... not wanting to mess up her clothes as she continued to empty herself.

Eventually the toddler would squat there, now fully empty once again and now VERY MUCH in a messy and wet diaper, one which looked as if it could barely handle another mess as the toddler stood up her mess disgusting her as it filled and spread across all her private areas... she knew at once with her mental and physical limitations as a two year old she couldn’t change this... she needed help, too bad she was here alone. So not knowing anything else to do, the toddler spit out her pacifier and began to sniffle cutely... trying not to cry but... failing miserably as tears streamed from her face and the 2 year old toddler lost all control and started bawling her eyes out in a temper tantrum, stomping her feet in frustration as she felt the mess cling to her thanks to the diaper... before eventually she...
122321112213.title: That breakfast shake was a bad idea...

choices: Hide
Reveal herself
They found her
123.content:
But back outside the house, four women around Laura's former age was walking down the entrance path. Those four were in fact Laura's old college friends, getting ready for a surprise reunion.

The first person is a Caucasian woman at 45 with a lean body and saggy C cup breasts wearing a dress that goes down to her knees and have on pantyhose and a pair a three inch heel pumps. She flipped her long dull blonde hair to the side as she approached the front door, ready to open it.

Another woman that's 43 was next to her with caramel skin of a Latina, CC cup soft boobs, slighly pudgy body, and a mousy brown hair that's tied up in a ponytail. She was wearing a white tank top with a jean jacket and a pair of tight leggings with sneakers. She tapped her on the shoulder and said to her with worried and tired eyes, "Say, Sandy... I know you want to surprised our old college friend, but are you sure that is a good idea. I mean, the least we would do is call her first before coming here, in case she's not in there."

Sandy turned to her friend and told her, "Relax, Anita. I got everything under control. I mean we haven't see her since our last reunion a few years back. And considering that we are here on a little vacation, we might as well stop over to say hello."

The next woman is an African American ghetto like girl in of 46 with D cups that sag and wilt, but holding on by the suport bar and a fat like flab on her body underneath the blue and yellow Ankara Pattern robe and sandles. Twirling one of her black and gray dreadlocks, she said to Sandy, "Anita has a point. Lauren is our good friend and all, but we haven't heard from her in a long time and I don't know if she'll remember us. Hell, I'm not sure if she's in the house at all."

Just then, an Asian woman at forty approahced her with modest B cups and a thin and lanky form underneath her busienss suit complete with loafers and black hair done up in a bun with a gray streak to the side. "I agree with Jacqueline. It's not like you can ring the doorbell and she will come in." she said to her, "Besides, you don't have a key to get in yourself either."

Sandy turned to the two and told her that she got it. "Jacqueline... Mika... Girls... You worry too much. Lauren has been a good friend for us during our college days, helping us with our work for our classes. She would be happy to see us after this long. Besides, you remember when she leaves a key under the matress in emergencies cause she's always forgetful about leaving without another."

The three looked to each other and remembered something like that. That's when Anita turned to her and responded with, "Yeah... What about it?"

Sandy soon approached the door and looked down at the Welcome mat in front of her feet. Bending down, she peeled it and found something she needed. Picking it up, she stood and turned back to them, dangling the emergency house key she found. "Old habits die hard and all." she responded.

The three saw this and never thought that she would accomplish that. "Ah... Now I get it." Jacqueline said.

With that, Sandy approached the front door and put the key into the hole. She soon peeked back to them and told them, "Get ready girls. Time to give our friend the surprise of her life."

So she turned the lock and knob and the door was fully opened.
____________________________________________________________________________ ________________________________________________________

At the same time, Lauren looked to her younger self and was still baffled on her now thirty something body. She knew that this dice is addicting and anymore rolls can lead her to becoming a baby, or worse. So her only option is to return the dice back to the shop and forget about it. But fiding it would be a chore as she doesn't have a clue on where the address is actually at. She has to find it and fast before these dice became addicted to her. But as she was thinking about what to do, she heard the door opened and the voice of someone familiar.

"Oh Lauren! Are you home! It's your old college buddies, Sandy, Anita, Jaqueline, and Mika! We thought we drop by to say hello! Are you around?"

She heard that voice and was shocked of what she heard.

"Oh no! My friends?! Here?! Now?!? How did they get in here? Don't tell me that they found the key underneath the doormat."

She soon looked to her youthen body in her loose clothes and immediately realized something else.

"I can't let them see me like this! They'll be shocked and confused! I have to do something? But what? Should I hide, or should I reveal myself to explain?"
123.title: Laura's Friends Arrived

choices: Sandy Finds the Dice
Anita Finds the Dice
Jacqueline or Mika
1231.content:
Lauren thought about what to do with a short amount of time and came up with a wise decision. Hide! Quickly, she rushed up to her room and headed to a walk in closet hiding from plane sight and hoping that they won't come to her room. Taking a breather, she said to herself, "Good... Now I just have to wait here until they give up and leave the house. Hopefully they won't take too long. That and the fact that they won't come to my room. Just as long as they won't notice..."

She soon stopped herself and realized something else. Something she forgot about as she rushed away to hide. "Shit! Shit, shit, shit! The Dice! I must've left them on the coffee table while I was scared to be found. I should've brought them with me to hide. Then again, I do that and trip, I would regress even more if it lands on a certain number. Can't get out now and grab them. Those four would see me like this. I just hope they don't find the dice, otherwise, this will lead to a lot more problems then I have to go through."

So she waited to see if they leave, or they discover the dice.

________________________________________________

Meanwhile, Sandy, Anita, Jacqueline, and Mika were in the house, searching for their friend. But they haven't seen her yet and didn't hear a single word from her.

"Hello? Lauren? Are you home? We're here to say hi!" Sandy said with a bit of impatience.

Anita sighed and told her friend, "Give it up, Sandy. There haven't been a word from Lauren since we got in"

"Tell me about it. Probable guess is that she's out shopping or at her job." Jacqueline continued.

"Yeah... This was a complete waste of time." Mika finished.

Sandy turned to them and told them, "Now, now... Let's not give up just yet. We just need to expand our search. Let's just split up so we can cover more ground. Search every part of the house and return if you find anything. Chop, chop."

She clapped her hands and have them spread out. The three sighed and knew that this is a time waster, but they have no choice in the matter. So they split up and searched for Lauren, not knowing that the dice is in the house. So who's going to find the dice?
1231.title: Hide

info.brief_description: A Middle Aged woman finds a pair of dice that quite literally bring her back to her youth.
info.description:
Laura would be shopping around in a nearby mall when she gets ahold of some dice that echo in her head.

“The dice of youth have bonded with you, may they bring you happiness... or sorrow.”

Confused and clearly thinking it to be a joke she just puts them in her pocket and goes on with shopping... when they roll, thats when she realizes its not a joke and has to find a way to return the dice to a shop somewhere in her town without getting TOO young... despite the fact they seem to love accidentally rolling.
—-
Based on a CYOC storyline, converted to Writing.com because writing limits suck and I wanted to add some spins to the rules of the dice.
—-
Rules:
1. Dice only regress physically and ONLY regress.
2. Clothes don’t change with regression.
3. Potty Training changes when regressed young enough
4. Endgame is getting to the magic shop, she doesn’t know where it is at first so she’ll have to do some digging.
5. All regressions must have the dice voice use the following line:
““X” Years is the number of years you have walked this earth, now that number is “Y”. The dice returns what has been lost...”
X = Current Year of Age Pre Regression
Y = New Age Post Regression.
6. Dice regresses the user by subtracting the number from the age you currently have. So getting a 12 would reduce you 12 years and so on.
7. No Unbirth. The youngest age you can be regressed to is age 1, past that the dice cease to work.
